name: Z-WaveMe
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, what is the temperature inside”
”Alexa, open blinds to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control various Z-Wave appliances in your Smart Home using Z-Wave.Me gateways.

To use this skill you need a Z-Wave.Me hardware such as RaZberry 7 or Z-Wave.Me Hub or any other Z-Way-based controllers.

To link Alexa with your smart home devices, you will have to follow skill instructions, authenticate on your gateway thru the find.z-wave.me service, and grant rights to rooms and/or devices you want to be accessible by Alexa.
